summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated August 17, 2019, regarding subpoena records in the Epstein case. It provides a log of subpoenas served and received, and directs recipients to access the actual documents via the USAO's FTP site (USAFX).

persons.name: Will
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who can help others get an account to access the USAFX FTP site where subpoena documents are posted.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY is coordinating subpoena records related to the Epstein case as of August 2019.
A log of all subpoenas served and received has been compiled and is available in an attached spreadsheet (Updated_Subpoena_Log.xlsx).
The actual subpoena documents and returns are posted on a secure FTP site called USAFX, managed by the USAO.
Access to USAFX requires an account, and a person named 'Will' is identified as the point of contact for obtaining access.
